amendment.description: At the end of division B (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. ___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to mail any mass mailing (as defined in subparagraph (E) of section 3210(a)(6) of title 39, United States Code) which is larger than 4\1/4\ inches high x 6 inches long x 0.016 inches thick.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shea-Porter amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Shea-Porter amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Shea-Porter.
